title: Grab Amazon's best Apple deals from $15 before the month ends
description: Month-end Apple deals are delivering cash savings on dozens of devices, with prices dipping to as low as $22.99.Save up to $360 on Amazon. - Image credit: AppleThere are several attractive price drops at Amazon this week, ranging from an AirTag for $22.99 to Macs from $549.You can peruse top picks below, with a full roundup of discounts in our Apple Price Guide. Continue Reading on AppleInsider | Discuss on our Forums
author: Christine McKee
excerpt: Month-end Apple deals are delivering cash savings on dozens of devices, with prices dipping to as low as $22.99.
text: Month-end Apple deals are delivering cash savings on dozens of devices, with prices dipping to as low as $22.99. The best effective AirTag price, though, is on the 4-pack that is marked down to $69.99. html:
Month-end Apple deals are delivering cash savings on dozens of devices, with prices dipping to as low as $22.99.

There are several attractive price drops at Amazon this week, ranging from an AirTag for $22.99 to Macs from $549.

You can peruse top picks below, with a full roundup of discounts in our Apple Price Guide.

Discounted AirTag prices start at just $22.99.

AirTag deals are a popular option at Amazon this week, with prices starting at $22.99. The best effective AirTag price, though, is on the 4-pack that is marked down to $69.99.

  • AirTag: $22.99 ($7 off)
  • AirTag 4-pack: $69.99 ($30 off)

AirPods & Beats at up to $150 off

AirPods and Beats are up to $150 off.

AirPods and Beats are up to $150 off at Amazon as well, with prices dipping to as low as $49.

AirPods

  • AirPods Pro 2: $199 ($50 off)
  • AirPods 4 without ANC: $119 ($10 off)
  • AirPods 4 with ANC: $168.99 ($11 off)
  • AirPods Max with USB-C: $529.99 ($20 off)

Beats

  • Beats Studio Buds: $99.95 ($50 off)
  • Beats Studio Buds Plus: $149.99 ($20 off)
  • Beats Studio Pro Over-ear Headphones: $199.95 ($150 off)

Apple Watches from $199

Amazon's popular Apple Watch deals start at $169.

Amazon's Apple Watch deals offer savings up to $70 off current models.

Save on several Apple Watch models

  • SE 2 GPS with 40mm Aluminum Case (select colors): $199 ($50 off)
  • Series 10 GPS with 42mm Aluminum Case (select colors): $329 ($70 off)
  • Series 10 GPS with 46mm Aluminum Case (select colors): $359 ($70 off)
  • Ultra 2 with new Black Titanium Case (select bands): $731.89 ($68 off)
    • Shop the best Apple Watch prices...

iPads dip to $279

iPads are on sale from $279 at Amazon.

Apple's budget-friendly iPad 10th Generation is back down to $279, while M2 Air and M4 Pro models are up to $200 off with today's top iPad deals.

Latest iPad markdowns

  • iPad 10th Generation (64GB, Wi-Fi): $279 ($20 off)
  • M2 iPad Air 6 11-inch (128GB, Wi-Fi): $499 ($100 off)
  • M2 iPad Air 6 13-inch (128GB, Wi-Fi): $699 ($100 off)
  • M4 iPad Pro 11-inch (512GB, Wi-Fi, Standard Glass): $1,049.99 ($150 off) with on-page coupon
  • M4 iPad Pro 13-inch (256GB, Wi-Fi, Standard Glass): $1,099 ($200 off)
  • M4 iPad Pro 13-inch (2TB, Standard Glass): $2,099 ($200 off)
    • Compare iPad prices across the range...

Mac computers from $549

Apple's Mac line is heavily discounted at Amazon.

Both laptop and desktop Macs are eligible for triple-digit savings at Amazon as month-end deals launch.

13-inch MacBook Air

  • M2 13" Air (8-core GPU, 16GB RAM, 256GB SSD): $799 ($200 off)
  • M3 13" Air (8-core GPU, 16GB RAM, 256GB SSD): $989 ($110 off)
  • M3 13" Air (10-core GPU, 16GB RAM, 512GB SSD) in Starlight: $1,189 ($110 off)
  • M3 13" Air (10-core GPU, 24GB RAM, 512GB SSD): $1,299 ($200 off)
    • Find plenty of additional markdowns in our M3 13-inch MacBook Air Price Guide...

15-inch MacBook Air

  • M3 15" Air (16GB RAM, 256GB SSD): $1,189 ($110 off)
  • M3 15" Air (16GB RAM, 512GB SSD) in Starlight: $1,149 ($150 off)
  • M3 15" Air (24GB RAM, 512GB SSD): $1,499 ($200 off)
    • Find discounts in every model in our M3 15-inch MacBook Air Price Guide...

14-inch MacBook Pro

  • M4 14" MBP (10-core CPU, 10-core GPU, 16GB RAM, 512GB SSD) Space Black: $1,589 ($210 off)
  • M4 Pro 14" MBP (14-core CPU, 20-core GPU, 24GB RAM, 1TB SSD) Space Black: $2,149 ($250 off)
  • M4 Max 14" MBP (14-core CPU, 32-core GPU, 36GB RAM, 1TB SSD) Space Black: $2,887 ($313 off)
    • Grab dozens of additional deals in our Mac Price Guide...

16-inch MacBook Pro

  • M4 Pro 16" MBP (14-core CPU, 20-core GPU, 24GB RAM, 512GB SSD) Space Black: $2,239 ($260 off)
  • M4 Pro 16" MBP (14-core CPU, 20-core GPU, 48GB RAM, 512GB SSD) Space Black: $2,627 ($270 off)
  • M4 Max 16" MBP (14-core CPU, 32-core GPU, 36GB RAM, 1TB SSD) Space Black: $3,139 ($360 off)
    • Save on every configuration in our 16-inch MacBook Pro M4 Price Guide...

M4 Mac mini

  • M4 Mac mini (10-core CPU, 10-core GPU), 16GB, 256GB: $549 ($50 off)
  • M4 Mac mini (10-core CPU, 10-core GPU), 16GB, 512GB: $719 ($80 off)
  • M4 Mac mini (10-core CPU, 10-core GPU), 24GB, 512GB: $919 ($80 off)
    • Compare M4 Mac mini prices on every model...

M4 iMac

  • M4 24" iMac (8-core CPU, 8-core GPU), 16GB, 256GB in Silver: $1,149 ($150 off)
  • M4 24" iMac (10-core CPU, 10-core GPU), 16GB, 256GB: $1,374 ($125 off)
    • Shop the lowest M4 iMac prices on dozens of configs...

Apple accessories fall to as low as $14.99

Apple accessories, including iPhone 16 cases, are on sale.

Chargers, cables, cases, and Apple Pencils are all marked down as well, with prices from $14.99.

  • Apple USB-C Woven Charge Cable (1m): $15 ($4 off)
  • Apple 20W USB-C Power Adapter: $14.99 ($5 off)
  • iPhone 16 Pro Silicone Case: $34 ($15 off)
  • Apple Pencil Pro: $99 ($30 off)
